summary: Backend-only testing of 3-Way Boom Mount Selector feature (bonded/insulated/nonconductive) completed. 27/27 tests passed (100%). Tested: boom_mount field for each type, correction_multiplier values (1.0/0.55/0), corrected_elements list with cut corrections, gain ordering (bonded<insulated<nonconductive), SWR comparison, backward compatibility with legacy boom_grounded parameter.

minor.issue: Backward compatibility limitation: boom_grounded=false alone does NOT trigger nonconductive behavior because Pydantic default boom_mount='bonded' takes precedence. Client must explicitly set boom_mount='nonconductive' to get nonconductive behavior.

action_items: OPTIONAL: Consider making boom_mount field Optional[str] with None default, then use boom_grounded as fallback when boom_mount is None - this would restore full backward compatibility
critical_code_review_comments: 3-way boom mount correctly implemented: bonded (100% DL6WU correction), insulated (55%), nonconductive (0%)
corrected_elements list properly populated with type, original_length, corrected_length, correction, unit fields
correction_multiplier field correctly set: 1.0 for bonded, 0.55 for insulated, 0 for nonconductive
Gain order verified: bonded (13.45 dBi) < insulated (13.46 dBi) < nonconductive (13.48 dBi)
SWR order verified: bonded (1.54) >= insulated (1.54) >= nonconductive (1.53)
Descriptions are informative and appropriate for each mount type with practical_notes array
seed_data_creation: None - tests use standard 4-element antenna configuration
context_for_next_testing_agent: 3-way boom mount feature fully tested. POST /api/calculate accepts boom_mount ('bonded'|'insulated'|'nonconductive'). Key response fields in boom_correction_info: boom_mount (echoed), correction_multiplier (1.0/0.55/0), corrected_elements (array with cut list for bonded/insulated, empty for nonconductive), enabled (true/true/false). Gain penalty: bonded > insulated > nonconductive=0. Legacy boom_grounded param still works but boom_mount takes precedence when both specified.

backward_compatibility.boom_grounded_false: DOES NOT trigger nonconductive due to Pydantic default (known limitation)

boom_correction_info.corrected_elements: [4 elements with type, original_length, corrected_length, correction, unit]
